TestDescription.name: SMB Administrator account without password
TestDescription.Description: It was possible to establish a SMB session using the Administrator account with a blank password.
TestDescription.Recommendation: You need to limit local account use of blank passwords to console login only. [break][break] [ul] [li][Start] [Run] and type [bold]gpedit.msc[/bold] and click [OK][/li] [li]Navigate to Computer Configuration / Windows Settings / Security Settings / Local Policies / Security Options[/li] [li]Double click on Accounts: Limit local account use of blank passwords to console login only.[/li] [li]Select the radio button next to [bold]Enabled[/bold] and click [OK][/li] [/ul]
